body: You need to create a new "classic" or "vintage" category and put these Japanese hentai mangas in them for easy location.

Super Taboo is what 25-30 years old? Somebody just had to republish a scan of a commercially translated manga that's been around the internet more times than the internet? Well, at least it's a good one.
It would be better if it was only with his sister... and go on the date with her, having a vanilla relationship... ~ ~
